title: Russell Cave National Monument: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety      Be aware of your surroundings while visiting Russell Cave. You should always be on the lookout for snakes and poison ivy when hiking. Remember, all wildlife, including snakes, are protected. Wear insect repellent if you plan to spend a lot of time on the trail. Always wear comfortable shoes, and stay on the marked trails at all times.  Bring something for lunch if you are planning a several hour visit, and always have plenty of water with you.
